directions: Place the chicken breasts into a slow cooker; pour in the lime juice and chicken stock. Add the garlic, thyme, pepper, and butter.
Cover, and cook on Low until the chicken is very tender, 8 to 10. Stir in the rice during the last 15 minutes of cooking time.
ingredients: 1 1/4 pounds skinless, boneless chicken breast halves
title: Slow Cooker Lime Chicken with Rice
